articles.title: 2022 Asian Games postponed, Chinese state media reports - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Hangzhou was expected to host the Games in September, but CCTV reports that the date will change as China battles its latest Covid-19 outbreak.

articles.description: PM says chief executive's Nadia Lim comments are a disservice to all women.
articles.content:

articles.title: Tearful Amber Heard testifies ex-husband Johnny Depp turned violent - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The actress told a Virginia jury that Depp physically abused her multiple times, starting when he slapped her after she laughed at the writing on one of his tattoos.
articles.content: Aquaman actress Amber Heard choked back tears on Wednesday (May 4) as she testified that ex-husband Johnny Depp physically abused her, starting with slaps after she laughed at one of his tattoos and … [+3490 chars]

articles.title: Comedian Dave Chappelle tackled on stage at Hollywood Bowl: Reports - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Footage circulating on social media showed a man charging on to the stage and tackling Chappelle as he was performing at the Hollywood Bowl during the Netflix Is A Joke festival.
articles.content:
Chappelle was performing at a new, 11-day comedy festival called Netflix Is A Joke, according to organisers.
